website_summaries.verdict: It's limited by a narrow spotlight beam, but customers praise its brightness and reliability over time.
pros: Unlike most spotlights, this one remains very bright even on the lowest settings
cons: Narrow spotlight beam fails to light up entire surrounding area

customer_reviews.title: Its lite, and powerful
customer_reviews.text: If you need more power that this, buy a lighthouse. I am sick and tired of gagets with built in batteries. After a couple of year they are in the garbage. This has 4 c batteries and they have very long shelf lives. Almost everything I own these days has replaceable batteries... You will love this light. Just be gentle on the trigger. Some say its a possible problem so treat it with respect
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on with Battieres
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights for boating at night but now it won't turn on with batteries only. It does work with the 12v DC chord provided but will not turn on when fresh batteries are installed. It's in perfect condition and no battery corrosion or build up inside.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp! - Boaters must
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic light. Bought it for boating and it's fantastic. A friend saw it and bought one for his boat. Can use it everywhere. I'm still on the original batteries - ready to change now - I've had and used it for a couple years now - maybe 3? Wow - great light / distance / etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Until it Dies
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, decent beam. switch is mushy/activation not smooth - not like a typical Streamlight........but wait - Its made in CHINA! Worked OK for 3 years then died. Expensive rental.
customer_reviews.author: LARichard

customer_reviews.title: Not a hands free spotlight
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable stand on top of the light gives the impression that it is a hands free light. Not so. The trigger has to be constantly held. The operating instructions state that the trigger should be pressed one time to turn the light on OR off. Not correct. The trigger has to be held constantly. If released, the light will go off.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Black

customer_reviews.title: Bright, compact and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is a very good value. I have a target across the canyon at 500 yards as per laser rang finder. It projects a beam across the canyon that is very intense but I cannot see the target because of back reflection from water vapor or dust in the air. But out to 150 yards it provides a very bright spot light and the unit is very light and compact. Very handy light. I wish the C size batteries were also available in lithium ion rather than the alkaline. Not had it long enough to find out how long batteries will last.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Goatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Spot for Use on a Boat
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a reliable, high intensity spotlight for use on our boat. This is it. If you are concerned that an LED will not throw enough light...don't be. This thing has better intensity than several large, heavy traditional spots we have used over many years. Both intensity and battery life are impressive. And the spot is light weight. It has a cord for running directly off 12V battery, but doubt it will be needed given the battery life. Also has a useful mounting holster for keeping the spot secure while underway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light, tough and bright
customer_reviews.text: This light is great. I am a Fishing Boat Captain and it is extremely important to have a reliable and easy to engage light. The light is very bright with a tight stream line shine. Also it can take a beating, as I have dropped it and tossed it around many times.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Durable. Can be used with car charger. No recharable batteries, but the regular batteries last a long time. We have bears in our neighborhood and I use it when walking the dog at night. Also take it with me in the car at night. If I feel uneasy, the strobe function seems to help those who are too curious or looking to cause trouble to leave me alone. I feel safer when I have it with me. There are no street lights or sidewalks where I live and I can see everything in my path with this bright light.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, Narrow Beam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing to do storage auctions and because it is battery powered so I don't have to worry about it shutting down halfway through the day. It's not ideal for my purposes because while it is insanely bright it has a narrow beam if you're looking at tight spots, but it's still better than anything else I have found out there. If you want to light up something a block away, though, or light up Sputnik or something, this is ideal, once you get some distance or if you have some open area the light diffuses and becomes better than anything else I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: NATHANIEL

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that the batteries weren't included
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that the batteries weren't included. I didn't realize it only came with a car charger. Finally got the batteries and was super pleased at how bright this is. It is great for the back yard - I can shine the spotlight over the entire yard and can keep an eye on my dogs - could see the possum before they did and called them back before there was a ruckus.
customer_reviews.author: Aschie

customer_reviews.title: Streamlight 44900 Waypoint Spotlight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and liked it so much I ordered two more. I use batteries and have lasted for hours. I lost one in a house fire and will replace. I bought the one with 12V capability.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgdog

customer_reviews.title: Very bright hand held spotlight.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright hand held spotlight. Haven't used it enough to rate battery life but so far it has been worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This did not work right out of the box. What really stinks is that I got charged for shipping for a product that never even worked. 'This is absolutely wrong.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: This light gets good reviews from sailing mags for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This light gets good reviews from sailing mags for a reason. It is a very nice light. Super bright, very light and easy to use. It is also compact making it easy to handle and store. If you need a powerful light on the boat and appreciate something that can be held easily in one hand, which is important on a boat, this is a great light.
customer_reviews.author: B. Greene

customer_reviews.title: excellent! worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: excellent ! worth every penny, I use it mostly in my boat at night plugged in to 12v receptical,works for hours off boat battery,then I unplug it an it works off the 4'c' batterys, lite weight an very handy you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the boat.
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our sailboat. It's water resistant, compact, and has a long battery life.... and it comes with a cigarette lighter plug as a back up. The holder is very handy... we have it mounted just inside the companion way. The beam is powerful and projects for at least 100 yards. Having a less-bright setting for use as a trouble light eliminates the need for a second flashlight. Only wish was that the beam was a little wider... but all in all a great boat light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Flashlight on the Market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best flashlights I've ever had. I got this one for our mailman, and he too is now a lover of this flashlight. One can see a great distance using this light. I highly recommend this to anyone who likes to check things out at night and needs to see a good distance. It came packed well and got to me in a timely fashion. You too will love this light, order one today.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: You light up my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I like hi beam for scanning the field, checking the welfare of my two Alpacas; Arty and Jack. I can spot them hundreds of yards away, seeing their eyes first, when it is pitch black nightness. If I see three sets of eyes it might be a coyote come to visit. Low beam is fine as a flashlight. On the down side, the power switch is really stiff.
customer_reviews.author: king james version

customer_reviews.title: Streamlight spotlight
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a different brand originally & it only worked for about 2 weeks, so I returned it & bought the Streamtlight. It works great, holds a long charge, & the hand strap is very convenient. I like having 3 settings, altho' I usually just use 1 setting. This spotlight seems to be trustworthy, which is what one needs if out in the dark ~ knowing your flashlight will work & this one does that.
customer_reviews.author: BK123

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best light on the market by FAR!!! Super bright, long reaching and long lasting. I used this in NoDak for hunting and we used it to see our layout at night for the morning hunt. Saved the day from a bad setup at night.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, compact, well-made
customer_reviews.text: This light throws a strong beam on the highest setting. I have no problem illuminating deer and coyotes at 200 yards on clear nights. Beyond that range, identifying wildlife is a stretch, but boats, buoys, etc. would be no problem whatsoever. There's a close-in "halo," which I find slightly distracting/annoying, and Streamlight should (I think) work on that. However, this is an excellent light in a small "package" at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Labtrainer12

customer_reviews.title: added batteries and ops checked good. Placed it in my boat storage bag in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had oringinally bought this to use for nighttime trips out on my boat. It arrived, added batteries and ops checked good. Placed it in my boat storage bag in the console. Went to use it a month later while out on the water after sunset and it appears to have be obliterated. It’s a stretch to call this thing durable and I definitely wouldn’t count on it unless you plan to keep it in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Orvil Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the size fool you.
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome. It's not that big, but the further it shines, the brighter it gets. It works great when out in the orchards checking things out. I use it in my Polaris Ranger for an added light source. Just a great light, and very durable. It has a dim light, as well as a strobe setting.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly c hanthorn

customer_reviews.title: High quality light with stamina
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light at night and the spotlight is effective at 1/3 mile. The combination of a central intense beam of light surrounded by a more diffuse array of light is a credit to the reflector. This allows one to see forward without falling over things but has the extra intensity of the central spot to focus the more intense light. The build quality is high and has performed well many times. When traveling in mountainous forest at night (usually to fight fires), the combination of intense light and several hours of stamina allows it to beat many others, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Small, but powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought but I think it will work fine for our needs. Note that it has NO internal battery. You either need to put the C batteries in it, or use it while it is hooked into a cigarette lighter. Cord isn't that long, so the cigarette lighter doesn't work for our needs. The light is bright, but narrow. We've only had it a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time .
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. You will pay big bucks for a cheap led, surounded by a cheap plastic housing, with toy switches. Its something you wouldn't pay $10.00 for at Harbor Freight.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price! This spotlight has exceeded all my expectations. I was surprised at how small and compact it is compared to the light it puts out. The beam is far reaching and perfect for my planned bigfoot searches with my Italian greyhound dog.
customer_reviews.author: B man

customer_reviews.title: Batteries did not run mine
customer_reviews.text: Works good when plugged into a cigarette chargers. Bought 4 "C" cell batteries and installed and the light would not work with them. If you plan on using it in the vehicle then it would have been a 5 star due to the brightness. If you want to run off of batteries then maybe I got a bad one and others will work fine but beware.
customer_reviews.author: Comp-U-Build--Sales

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with batteries!!! Defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great product, worked great with the cigarette 12v connector but it didn't work with batteries. I only bought it to be able to use it with or without batteries now I'm stuck with a very expensive not very portable spotlight.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for spotting deer at night. I love the three settings (emergency strobe, low, high), the option to hold the on switch continually or click for power, and the ability to set the stand for other uses. I searched a lot of lights before purchasing and definitely feel this was the best choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Honestysmypolicy

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I read all the good reviews and STILL I was blown away when I say this thing slice through the darkness. Extremely powerful light, sturdy construction, and plugs into the truck or uses batteries. I find myself reaching for this even when a regular flashlight will do, but when a regular flashlight won't do, you can be sure this spotlight will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Rider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spot light
customer_reviews.text: One of the best LED spotlight on the market, it's waterproof, runs on 4 C size batteries, or DC power. This light can put a beam of light on anything, or anyone at close range, or up to 250 meters lit up very well. Beam is adjustable. Excellent spot light. I recommend this product to anyone that's an outdoors or maritime person, that knows when they need light this spot light is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Convenient spotlight
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the lumen count fool you, this light can throw. Nice tight beam. Trigger clicks on/off so u don't have to always mash the button like some spotlights. Also, very handy in that u can use it with C batteries and/or 12V cord. Kids love the strobe, i like the half power setting that makes the batteries last when u don't need to light up the whole country.
customer_reviews.author: William T Stotts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little light. Not the most powerful, but it gets the job done. The low power setting is great while gator hunting.
customer_reviews.author: C-double

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, versatile spotlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a top quality spotlight that is well-made, comfortable to carry and grip, and extremely effective in its illumination. It is easy to carry in a backpack and also very handy to keep in a car or truck. I've bought a fair number of similar products in the past, but none has come close to the utility and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doc K.

customer_reviews.title: The spotlight's spot light.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, almost as bright as the classic brink man million candlepower but no chance of burning a hole in the uphosltry or running a battery dead. Can't wait to do some night fishing with this. Haven't killed the C's yet with a month of several time a week short duration usage which I find impressive. Between this and a good headlamp I got no problem working in the dark now. Oh yeah, everyone I''ve shown it to can't believe it wasn't over 100 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, with nice features. Easy to turn on and off without cycling thru different settings which is a PITA. I'll probably buy another one or two
customer_reviews.author: L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I just received my light today I’ve been outside playing with it lol it’s exactly what I was hoping it would be it’s very bright and shines over 100 yards I can’t wait to put it to use while hunting and fishing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a good halogen spotlight because I thought it would be brighter ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good halogen spotlight because I thought it would be brighter than an led. Boy was I wrong. I ordered this one because of the good reviews. I tried it out along side my halogen. No contest. The Streamlight is so much brighter especially at a distance. I ordered another one the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Gl B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design for off roading needs at night.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to carry in my Jeep when we off road at night. Very powerful light and the fact it plugs into a 12v outlet, makes having low batteries a non issue. I suggest you buy a 12 foot extension cord for the 12v outlet as added insurance if you need to change tires or want some extra length to use the light, again, in case the batteries are low.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Linegar

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: The light can use a DC cord to your cigarette lighter, or by 4C size batteries. It is an LED light, with a polished, deep reflector. This makes for a tightly focused beam, that reaches out. The switch has a full, dim and strobe setting. Good light to have in your vehicle and outdoors. Appears to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Beam and charger and everything is great
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Beam and charger and everything is great!! Just got my buddy a $600 ticket for spotlighting so yeah. Boooooooo
customer_reviews.author: Hpr1993

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and affordable light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and affordable light...and $40 less than West Marine. Bright light with more than enough power from boat to shoreline or dock. Recommend very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Todt C.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have owned. Used mostly for night boating to find channel markers. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kent lacey

customer_reviews.title: Makes night-time boating a whole lot safer
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this filter I was always hesitant to stay out on the boat after dawn. This effectively allows me to not have to worry about finding the dock after dark. So far I have only used it when plugged into my DC port. I can not speak for how long the battery lasts but the spotlight itself feels durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: A.Z

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and easy to use. Best of all it uses regular C batteries.
customer_reviews.author: g man

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This light is very bright and works very well. I use it at night a lot to look out in my backyard to see if any animals are prowling around. I liked it so well I bought one for my son-in-law for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: The capability to use off the shelf cells and the LED light is great.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every dime. Small, light & powerful. It will light up items a couple of football fields away. It's a true spot vs flood so don't expect it to light a large area. Sick of rechargeable batteries that weigh a lot and hard to find. The capability to use off the shelf cells and the LED light is great.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great spotlight
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these awhile back and now getting as a great gift for boss man.
customer_reviews.author: luvkat75

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as I had hoped for use on ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I had hoped for use on the boat at night. Seems to be robust in construction.
customer_reviews.author: kc434

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great spotlight. Working well so far. Light is very bright. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Streamlight 550 or 210 lumens??
customer_reviews.text: I received the light yesterday and tested it out last night. First thing I noticed was the switch is not well defined and an effort to squeeze. The balance and feel is great. The light is good. Lit up the trees and houses very well at 100yds. I like the C battery POWER as opposed to a rechargable you cannot replace. I have had bad experiances with rechargable products with non replaceable battery and do not trust them. What I do not understand is why there is a 550 lumens sticker on the Waypoint box covering 210 lumens. Can anyone give me the answer? What is it 210 or 550 lumens?
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Best SPOT light you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best handheld spotlight I ever bought. I liked it so much I bought several as Christmas presents. The batteries last a long, long time. Not sure why you would ever want to run it off DC. Puts out a bright narrow beam that shines a long ways. If you want a flood light this is not for you. If you want to make it more waterproof, I would run a bead of silicon or wateproof tape along the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Smile Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright LED spot
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my son..He loves it. Tried to take it back, and he won't give it up. Guess I will have to buy my own. Impressive and uses little energy. Much better than those with heavy built in battery. Get rechargable c cells and use them when you don't have 12V access. Light is much lighter and useful.
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: the new improved model is excellent(older 210 lumens was good too)
customer_reviews.text: the new model has over 500 lumens compared to 210 for the last one. These are nice portable non rechargeable spotlights. The beam isn't as wide as some but you can see a deer's antlers more clearly.....just can't see as many deer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t get it deeper than 2 ft for long periods of time, it will die
customer_reviews.text: Great spot light, love the battery part of it, rechargeable sucks cause once that goes your done. This is my second one and for the money there great, use it for duck hunting early morning getting into tight spots
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light !!!! Shine it on something and it looks like daylight !!!!!!! Jim
customer_reviews.author: J.Payne

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfict beam light.
customer_reviews.text: This light is brighter than any other light I have ever used. I can see my whole back yard when using this light. It's even brighter than my flood lights. I bet this light would shine a mile (of course I have not tested that). It's a great light and I suggest everyone have this light.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: when you receive it you would be initially offput just like i was
customer_reviews.text: this light is alot smaller than you think... when you receive it you would be initially offput just like i was, and almost demand a refund... But once you light it up, your worries are gone. I dont know how this little light does it, but it shines for hundreds of yards.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had it long enough to know how the batteries will last but I would recommend this to anyone who needs to see at night
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Much brighter than I had expected. Haven't had it long enough to know how the batteries will last but I would recommend this to anyone who needs to see at night! Bought it for a friend that delivers packages, sometimes into the night. Had no trouble reading the addresses from the street!
customer_reviews.author: MAURA SLATER

customer_reviews.title: Streamlight products outperform the competition
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for boating, streamlight products have never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: MiandaB

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: I received this light Aug 3rd. Used it once. It's mounted in its holder in my boats cockpit. Hermine blew through and the light filled with water. I took the light inside and let it drain hoping it would dry and still work. I just had the chance to test the light today (Sept 6th) and it doesn't work any longer. I wanted to have it replaced but Amazon says the cutoff was Sept 3rd. So my money went down the drain on this one. I'm pissed.
customer_reviews.author: David Draper

customer_reviews.title: Tough, bright, streamlight.
customer_reviews.text: This light is impressively designed and durable. It is comfortable to hold, easy to change settings from bright dim and strobe. The only complaint is the odd battery choice (C) however it does help with size and keeping it compact.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel santangelo

customer_reviews.title: Great light! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second, purchased for home use. The first one is in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Campboss

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Update: This really has turned out to be an astonishing piece of crap. It has rarely worked without being banged on to get the beam to maximum brightness. It consistantly performed horribly and unreliably. Today after 2 years of rare use and many sets of new batteries it let me down for the last time and I enjoyed immensely throwing it at full force into a brick wall. If you want a reliable and consistant flashlight that will actually work when you need it to, look elsewhere. Smaller than expected as a few have said. Was used to the monster lead acid spots of my youth. Very clean light and bright. The size is great too.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Great Illuminations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to take out on my boat at night to help spot crabpots. It puts out a powerful light and I like the fact it runs on C batteries rather than the rechargeable ones that only work for 6 months. Very compact and easy to hold while driving a boat. Good value. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Old

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, can't praise it enough
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light, can't praise it enough. Have one for myself and have bought more as gifts. These are so bright and well made, strongly recommend. Batteries last long, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Small pack big light
customer_reviews.text: This little light was smaller than expected but good things come in small packages is sometimes true. Powerful great light. I plan on purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: S&R Pino

customer_reviews.title: Not good spotlight
customer_reviews.text: This version of the waypoint does not shine too bright if you want good brightness buy the rechargable version the 12v version should only cost 15 dollars or less
customer_reviews.author: brad f.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light. Easily spot animals at 200yards in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light. Easily spot animals at 200yards in the field at night on high. Included mount is nice. Now mounted behind the back garage man door for skunk spotting duty.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Maher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bright, portable, and easy to store in truck and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright with a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a compact bright spotlight for use in my boat. Not only did this one fit the bill, it exceeded it. Very bright and fits in one of my compartments easily. Having a lifetime warranty doesn't hurt. I would recommend this light to anyone looking for a solid, durable, bright, compact spotlight.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: wow, must have for everybody
customer_reviews.text: this lil light paks a punch, when it arrived I thought oh oh, what did I just blow 50.00 on, read all the reviews.........I hunt * fish so when I took this lil guy along fishing to spot all my tipups at 100yds plus, I had no issues what so ever or regrets, it is easy on the Polaris charging system/12volt as its LED, great on the 4 C batteries for 8 plus hrs, everybody on the fishing trip tried to steal my light, low beam like a small flashlight or spot for way out there & best yet its compact size, I would put my name on the light, thanx Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Shagbark Hickory

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this spotlight
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this spotlight. I use it on my boat, and keep it near the helm. At times, it's illuminated otherwise dim and or difficult obstacles and has been very helpful in night time anchoring and mooring to other boats.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bright and well made
customer_reviews.text: This light really pierces the darkness of the night. It is slightly awkward to hold compared to a small Magnalite or, for that matter, a larger one. But for the purpose of scanning the trees or meadows this light works well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bright light. Works great and great distance on beam.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and bright
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, I use it for firefighting. Works great
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Alien Technology For The Masses
customer_reviews.text: This is a brutal spot with a narrow beam for long distance applications. You might also consider the Coast HP550 in this price range. It also goes the distance but, will throw a spread that will light up a corn field. Either torch will put hair on your chest.You don't buy a light like this to walk the dog or check your fuse box
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Having owned both a StreamLight Stinger, and an UltraStinger for several years, I knew this was a good bet. I was right. The pinpoint beam offers a different function, and the 8 hour battery life means I may never need to buy more. I counted the rings on a raccoons tail from maybe 60 yards; beyond that, it's stronger than my eyes! The Low Beam, and Strobe are bonuses. Only con is the maybe 8 pound trigger pull; OK for me, but could be problematic for those with compromised hand strength.
customer_reviews.author: Charles V. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: A real tool
customer_reviews.text: Like streamlights motto, "Tools, not Toys", this is a very sturdy and functional little light. For a single LED the beam it puts out is mighty impressive. I like how you can dim it down for working up close and not blinding you self.
customer_reviews.author: Leeland H.

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This may have been one of the greatest purchases I have ever made. Especially for an outdoorsman.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best spotlight I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I could pay up more to get one that had rechargeable batteries, but this one works so well with the regular batteries, and I haven't had to replace them yet! I bought a second one I liked it so much. Built solid, and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I just received this light, so too early to talk about reliability, but first impressions are very good. The build quality appears good. The plastic moldings are sturdy. The wrist lanyard appears strong. Gasketing around the battery compartment is good. I have a 4 battery Maglite and I took both lights outside to compare last night. The Streamlight is significantly brighter with a well focused beam. In fairness, the batteries in the Maglite are not new and the difference would likely be lessened, but still, I'm very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good quality beam
customer_reviews.text: Good quality beam, sturdy housing. Seems to work better on the c-cells than on the 12-volt adapter which is why I downgraded it a star.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: love it lets go night fishing, frogging or what ever
customer_reviews.text: Bad to the bone,love it very bright and works with battery's or plunges in to a 12volt lighter socket,get a 12 volt extension cord to go with this light,I like mine better then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Rear View Spotlight
customer_reviews.text: All i need in a pinch, i keep in the back of my SUV which has a 12volt outlet. Instant spotlight and with holder screwed to my ceiling its a hands free rear spot! Or pop off cradle for on the go Beam action
customer_reviews.author: judge mally

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone. Had to try it out first and was super impressed. Very bright and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dannyelle Swing

customer_reviews.title: nice spot light
customer_reviews.text: great light great warranty water resistant it works great i like the kick stand and the low will come in handy and the switch is click on click off and can change from low high and strobe wile on with the separate switch it is bright has nice spot not perfect but very useable i like that is uses c batteries better to me than a rechargeable spot light i have had 3 stanleys all with battery failure after 1 year plus i have streamlight stylus pro and like them and warranty is best i have seen i emailed them and they sent parts free i recomend streamlight i hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Does the job nicely, having 3 different modes: high light, low light and strobing/emergency light. Works well off the 12 V adapter. I have not tried it yet off the batteries to see how long it lasts for. But a very good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RobertLePoulet

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own batteries
customer_reviews.text: Good beam and range. You will need to buy your own rechargeable C size batteries (4). Other lights that I've purchased had the battery already in it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light, plugged in to a socket, or operating on batteries
customer_reviews.author: Rusty2052

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, and meets all expectations. I bought another only light to find out that it would not work with the 12V adapter hooked up. This one works off the batteries or off the 12V adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Parker

customer_reviews.title: Better than rechargeable.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than my previous AC Delco rechargeable spotlight (which I ruined by not keeping it charged). This one is lighter (since no heavy rechargeable battery), very narrow beam so it projects much farther than I expected for the power rating. Haven''t tried it with the C batteries since it is always in my car. Recommend highly, at least for car charger use, so far.
customer_reviews.author: FEC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little flash light if you want to call it that. I could see the beam during the day it's so bright. Also has a little stand mounted on it. There is a strobe light feature for emergencies. I would definitely by this light again if I had too.
customer_reviews.author: K O.

customer_reviews.title: bright light
customer_reviews.text: This shines across my pasture toward the barn. It is a bright light that I can use to walk outside when t here are no other lights around. It doesn't have a small area of light like a regular flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: crazyoaks

customer_reviews.title: Great spotlight, compact and powerful
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper lights out there, there are lighter weight lights out there, and there are rechargeable lights out there. But... For around $50 you get a very strong shell, a great free standing work light when you need it, a 3 mode switch, and it's LED forcryinoutloud! This thing blows away spotlights I've had in the past and it's totally worth the cost. It was $80 at Bass Pro and more than $100 a couple other places. I use it for inspecting homes but I can see many other practical uses.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic Battery Operated Spotlight
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best flashlights I have ever owned. I can illuminate objects 1400 feet away with a very bright beam. It is a spotlight.....not a floodlight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Head

customer_reviews.title: Amazing illumination; box claims ~1/4 mile in highest mode
customer_reviews.text: Amazing illumination; box claims ~1/4 mile in highest mode. I haven't tried to measure this but I believe it. Very Good, high quality, rugged, construction ( i haven't tested the water resistance but it has a gasket seal secured by a screw). Haven't used this spot light enough to comment on battery life nor have I used it with the included car based cigarette-lighter-chord. One note: the external DC cable is only compatible with a cigarette-lighter; However, I assume it will work with an 120/240 V A/C plugin converter / adapter similar to: 110V-240V AC to 12V DC Power Adapter Converter US / Universal AC-DC Power Socket Adapter Converter - Use Car Chargers... found on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Harry Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light! The best we have every owned!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my dad, He loves it! The light is very bright does an awesome job for what we need it for around our small farm.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Baker
